question:
Which of the following are the seven pillars of effective governance of NITI Aayog?
1. Pro-active in anticipating and responding to citizen needs.
2. Equality of opportunity for the youth.
3. Empowering women in all aspects.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: NITI Aayog is based on seven pillar of effective governance which are as follows: (1) Pro-people agenda that fulfils the aspirations of the society as well as individuals, (2) Pro-active in anticipating and responding to citizen needs, (3) Participative, (4) Empowering women in all aspects, (5) Inclusion of all groups, (6) Equality of opportunity, (7) Transparency.
